sentences.en: " Bears , dragons , tempestuous on mountain and river , Startle t he forest and make the heights tremble . "
sentences.cn: 熊 咆 龙吟殷岩泉, 栗深林兮惊层巅.
“ 夜色深沉,狂风肆虐,暴雨倾盆.

sentences.en: After a tempestuous two - month voyage they landed what is now Plymouth, Massachusetts on icy November day.
sentences.cn: 他们在海上辗转颠簸了两个月之后,在酷寒的11月登上了陆地,登陆地位于现在的马萨诸塞州普利茅斯市.

sentences.en: All the fury of her tempestuous soul fell , as the sea falls undera lapse of wind.
sentences.cn: 她那狂暴的灵魂发出的一切愤怒都在平息了, 如同大海在风暴之后的平静一样.

sentences.en: Au contraire, they are massive and tempestuous.
sentences.cn: 相反地, 它们可是非常厚重狂暴的.

sentences.en: Burst, to illumine our tempestuous day.
sentences.cn: 或许跌出, 把我们的风雨之日照明.

sentences.en: For years, the couple's tempestuous relationship made the headlines.
sentences.cn: 有好多年，那对夫妻跌宕起伏的关系总是登上报纸头条。

sentences.en: Her character falls in love very quickly with tempestuous Rochester.
sentences.cn: 她和性情乖戾的罗切斯特很快地陷入了爱河.

sentences.en: It was closer to being a turbulent ocean fomented by the tempestuous warp tides below.
sentences.cn: 它更接近于由飓风般的亚空间潮汐推动的狂暴洋面.

sentences.en: She burst into a tempestuous fit of anger.
She is in a tempestuous mood.
Somehow the marriage lasted for eight tempestuous months.
sentences.cn: 不管怎么说，那场婚姻还是维持了8个月，其间双方的关系一直很紧张。

sentences.en: Their married life was short and tempestuous.
sentences.cn: 他们的婚姻生活很短暂而且是吵吵闹闹的.

sentences.en: Their ship was sailing dangerously in the tempestuous sea.
sentences.cn: 他们的船在浪急风高的海上危险地航行着.

words.tran_cn: 有暴风雨的；暴乱的；剧烈的

trans.tran_cn: 暴风雨的，暴风雪的，剧烈的，狂暴的
trans.tran_en: a tempestuous relationship or period of time involves a lot of difficulty and strong emotions
